description.zh-cn: 毛泽东与杨开慧的第三个儿子。1927年出生，1931年后下落不明，官方说法为在上海因病早夭。
description.en: The third son of Mao Zedong and Yang Kaihui. Born in 1927, his whereabouts became unknown after 1931. The official account states he died of illness in Shanghai at a young age.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸龙的父亲。
description.en: Father of Mao Anlong.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸龙的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Mao Anlong.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸龙的出生地。
description.en: Birthplace of Mao Anlong.

description.zh-cn: 根据官方说法，是毛岸龙的逝世地。
description.en: According to the official account, it is the place of death of Mao Anlong.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的弟弟，根据族谱，是毛岸龙的过继父亲。
description.en: Younger brother of Mao Zedong and, according to the family genealogy, the adoptive father of Mao Anlong.

description.zh-cn: 据传闻，曾安排毛岸龙的收养事宜。
description.en: According to rumors, he arranged for the adoption of Mao Anlong.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的父亲，毛岸龙的祖父。
description.en: Father of Mao Zedong and paternal grandfather of Mao Anlong.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的母亲，毛岸龙的祖母。
description.en: Mother of Mao Zedong and paternal grandmother of Mao Anlong.

description.zh-cn: 杨开慧的父亲，毛岸龙的外祖父。
description.en: Father of Yang Kaihui and maternal grandfather of Mao Anlong.

description.zh-cn: 杨开慧的母亲，毛岸龙的外祖母。
description.en: Mother of Yang Kaihui and maternal grandmother of Mao Anlong.

description.zh-cn: 毛贻昌的父亲，毛岸龙的曾祖父。
description.en: Father of Mao Yichang and paternal great-grandfather of Mao Anlong.

description.zh-cn: 文素勤的父亲，毛岸龙的外曾祖父。
description.en: Father of Wen Suqin and maternal great-grandfather of Mao Anlong.

description.zh-cn: 杨昌济的父亲，毛岸龙的外曾祖父。
description.en: Father of Yang Changji and maternal great-grandfather of Mao Anlong.

description.zh-cn: 向振熙的父亲，毛岸龙的外曾祖父。
description.en: Father of Xiang Zhenxi and maternal great-grandfather of Mao Anlong.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸龙是毛泽东的第三个儿子。
description.en: Mao Anlong was the third son of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸龙是杨开慧的第三个儿子。
description.en: Mao Anlong was the third son of Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸龙于1927年在武昌出生。
description.en: Mao Anlong was born in Wuchang in 1927.

description.zh-cn: 根据毛泽东家族族谱，毛岸龙被过继给其叔父毛泽民。
description.en: According to the Mao Zedong family genealogy, Mao Anlong was posthumously adopted by his uncle Mao Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 据传闻，黄金荣曾安排养母收养毛岸龙，并为其改名。
description.en: According to rumors, Huang Jinrong arranged for an adoptive mother to take in Mao Anlong and change his name.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东是毛贻昌的儿子。
description.en: Mao Zedong was the son of Mao Yichang.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东是文素勤的儿子。
description.en: Mao Zedong was the son of Wen Suqin.

description.zh-cn: 杨开慧是杨昌济的女儿。
description.en: Yang Kaihui was the daughter of Yang Changji.

description.zh-cn: 杨开慧是向振熙的女儿。
description.en: Yang Kaihui was the daughter of Xiang Zhenxi.

description.zh-cn: 毛贻昌是毛恩普的儿子。
description.en: Mao Yichang was the son of Mao Enpu.

description.zh-cn: 文素勤是文绵熏的女儿。
description.en: Wen Suqin was the daughter of Wen Mianxun.

description.zh-cn: 杨昌济是杨书祥的儿子。
description.en: Yang Changji was the son of Yang Shuxiang.

description.zh-cn: 向振熙是向泰椿的女儿。
description.en: Xiang Zhenxi was the daughter of Xiang Taichun.
